name: Flower Shop (nightshiftdev)
description:
You are the owner of Flower Shop specialized in fast growing of red and purple flowers.

Fulfill your orders on time but be aware to not let your plants die :)
If your order queue is full (16 flowers), you only have 5 seconds left before you die, so hurry up

Controls:

Movement: WASD
Interact: Spacebar
Pickup: F
Drop: G

Musik by https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/single/pokimonkey
Soundeffects from: https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc
